description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Take on the role of our heroine Kate, the innocent and unknowing victim of an evil sorcerer's attempt to harness the powers of the mysterious Blackstone. As she embarks on a brave mission to save her village and help her friends, her quest soon leads her to the Clouded Mountain where she must discover both the true extent of her task and the real reason Blackstone is so desperately coveted.
description.short: Take on the role of our heroine Kate, the innocent and unknowing victim of an evil sorcerer's attempt to harness the powers of the mysterious Blackstone. As she embarks on a brave mission to save her village and help her friends, her quest soon leads her to the Clouded Mountain where she must discover both the true extent of her task and the real reason Blackstone is so desperately coveted.
